price: और निःसंदेह तुझपर बदले (क़ियामत) के दिन तक मेरी धिक्कार है।
arabic: وَإِنَّ عَلَيۡكَ لَعۡنَتِيٓ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ ٱلدِّينِ

version.title: Hindi Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indian by Azizul-Haqq Al-Umary.

meta.transliteration: wa-inna ʿalayka laʿnatī ilā yawmi al-dīni
